original_text: Now the rest of the deeds of Jehoiakim and all that he did, are they not written in the Book of the Chronicles of the Kings of Judah?
korean_text: 여호야김의 남은 사적과 행한 모든 일은 유다 왕 역대지략에 기록되지 아니하였느냐

sentences.original_text: Now the rest of the deeds of Jehoiakim
in the Book of the Chronicles of the Kings of Judah?
